welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Warfield, a charming and historic city known for its picturesque landscapes and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Farnborough Airport caters to the needs of VIP and business travelers, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used by British Airways for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used by a variety of airlines for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used by Oneworld alliance airlines for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The third oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used by SkyTeam alliance airlines for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The second newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, exclusively used by British Airways for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Benson Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
